      Methods in facade with parameters of type Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AdminFacade.createCustomer(Customer customer)

      void AdminFacade.removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      this method gives instruction for CustomerDBDAO class to remove a customer from the DB and remove all purchased coupons that attached to the customer
      void AdminFacade.updateCustomer(Customer customer)
